name: The Space Life
description:
This is  a simple hand drawn graphic game.This simulates the life of a boy who has a target of saving 10000 money 1000 knowledge and to buy all appliances in the store.and there is a secret door in your room which leads to space adventure

This game is still in development and will be updated eventually.This is my first game and I hope you like it 

Any donation is Appreciated 

Password for PC :hello

*****spoiler Alert*****

****************************************************************

The Secret door is next to the cupboard

***************************************************************

Thank You
